%--------------------------
% MODULAR RESUME LATEX TEMPLATE 
% This is the main file that compiles the resume using external data files.
% DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE (main.tex) UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
% Use data-contact.tex and data-resume.tex to modify contact info and resume content.
%--------------------------

\documentclass[letterpaper,11pt]{article}

%--------------------------
% PACKAGES
%--------------------------
\usepackage[empty]{fullpage}
\usepackage{titlesec}
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\usepackage{tabularx}
\usepackage{enumitem}
\usepackage{verbatim}
\usepackage{latexsym}
\usepackage{marvosym}
\usepackage[english]{babel}
\usepackage{fontawesome5}
\usepackage{mathptmx}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[margin=0.5in]{geometry}

%--------------------------
% HYPERLINKS
%--------------------------
\usepackage[hidelinks, pdfnewwindow=true, pdfpagemode=UseNone]{hyperref}

%--------------------------
% UNICODE SUPPORT
%--------------------------
\input{glyphtounicode}
\pdfgentounicode=1

%--------------------------
% PAGE LAYOUT
%--------------------------
\pagestyle{fancy}
\fancyhf{}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0pt}
\raggedbottom
\raggedright
\setlength{\tabcolsep}{0in}

%--------------------------
% SECTION FORMATTING
%--------------------------
\titleformat{\section}{\vspace{-6pt}\scshape\raggedright\large}{}{0em}{}[\titlerule \vspace{-5pt}]
\urlstyle{same}

%--------------------------
% CUSTOM COMMANDS
%--------------------------
\usepackage{xstring}

% Contact items
\newcommand{\contactItem}[3]{\IfStrEq{#3}{}{}{\hspace{4pt}#1~\href{#2}{\underline{#3}}}}
\newcommand{\contactItemNoLink}[2]{\IfStrEq{#2}{}{}{#1~#2}}

% Resume items
\newcommand{\resumeItem}[1]{\item\small{#1 \vspace{-2pt}}}
\newcommand{\resumeSubItem}[1]{\resumeItem{#1}\vspace{-4pt}}
\newcommand{\resumeSubHeadingListStart}{\begin{itemize}[leftmargin=0.15in, label={}]}
\newcommand{\resumeSubHeadingListEnd}{\end{itemize}}
\newcommand{\resumeItemListStart}{\begin{itemize}}
\newcommand{\resumeItemListEnd}{\end{itemize}\vspace{-5pt}}

% Resume headings
\newcommand{\resumeSubheading}[4]{%
  \vspace{-2pt}\item
  \begin{tabular*}{0.97\textwidth}[t]{l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r}
    \textbf{#1} & \small#2 \\
    \textit{\small#3} & \textit{\small#4} \\
  \end{tabular*}\vspace{-6pt}%
}

\newcommand{\resumeSubSubheading}[2]{%
  \item
  \begin{tabular*}{0.97\textwidth}{l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r}
    \textit{\small#1} & \textit{\small #2} \\
  \end{tabular*}\vspace{-6pt}%
}

\newcommand{\resumeProjectHeading}[2]{%
  \item
  \begin{tabular*}{0.97\textwidth}{l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r}
    \small#1 & \small#2 \\
  \end{tabular*}\vspace{-6pt}%
}

\newcommand{\resumeCertItem}[2]{%
  \item
  \begin{tabular*}{0.97\textwidth}[t]{l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r}
    \textbf{#1} & \small#2 \\
  \end{tabular*}\vspace{-6pt}%
}

\renewcommand\labelitemii{$\vcenter{\hbox{\tiny$\bullet$}}$}

%--------------------------
% DOCUMENT START
%--------------------------
\begin{document}

%--------------------------
% LOAD EXTERNAL DATA
%--------------------------
\makeatletter
\InputIfFileExists{data-contact.tex}{}{}
\InputIfFileExists{data-resume.tex}{}{}
\makeatother

%--------------------------
% HEADER: NAME AND CONTACT
%--------------------------
\begin{center}
    \textbf{\Huge \scshape \MyName} \\ \vspace{4pt}
    \small 
    \ifdefined\MyPhone \contactItemNoLink{\faIcon{phone}}{\MyPhone} \fi
    \ifdefined\MyEmail \contactItem{\faIcon{envelope}}{mailto:\MyEmail}{\MyEmail} \fi
    \ifdefined\MyLinkedIn \contactItem{\faIcon{linkedin}}{https://\MyLinkedIn}{\MyLinkedIn} \fi
    \ifdefined\MyGitHub \contactItem{\faIcon{github}}{https://\MyGitHub}{\MyGitHub} \fi
    \ifdefined\MyPortfolio \contactItem{\faIcon{globe}}{https://\MyPortfolio}{\MyPortfolio} \fi
\end{center}

%--------------------------
% RESUME CONTENT
%--------------------------
\resumeContent

\end{document}
